elements.text:
You are invited to a Halloween party with your coworkers and you're only close to a couple of people there. You decide to wear a costume. When you arrive, everyone looks at you. 

Here are some behaviors that someone might do at that moment or in the future:

text: I will smile and wear my outfit proudly.
I want to start crying, but then remind myself I did a great job on this costume.
I want to go to the bathroom and try to tone down what I'm wearing.
I want to ask someone if my costume is too much, but decide not to ask for opinions.
I'll start dancing because there's great music on.
